GameDBLocalizedString.Text: Witaj szefie, dziękujemy za powrót do nas, by nam pomóc. Wiemy, że miałeś powody do przejścia na emeryturę, ale z pewnością przyda nam się ktoś z twoimi umiejętnościami. Wiemy, że znasz się na diagnozowaniu pacjentów.
Mamy problemy z załogą, możesz nam pomóc przy paru pacjentach?\nAh, nie przejmuj się, przypomnę Ci jak tu wszystko działa.
Najpierw przyjrzyjmy się co się dziele w klinice. Możesz przybliżyć rolką oraz przesuwaj ekranem trzymając środkowy przycisk myszy.
Jak widzisz wszystkie ściany są postawione, zasłaniając widok. <b><i>Zmień wyświetlanie ścian</b<i> w taki sposób jaki lubisz.
Świetnie, teraz wybierz pacjenta, który czeka na nas w gabinecie lekarskim.
To jest panel pacjenta. Przedstawi Ci wszystkie ważne informacje na jego temat i pozwoli na kontrolę przebiegu leczenia pacjenta.
Po prawej stronie znajdziesz historię 6 ostatnio wybranych postaci.
Jeśli klikniesz na portret postaci, kamera zostanie wyśrodkowana na niej.
Możesz wybrać osobę odpowiedzialną za pacjenta. Możesz pozwolić Twojej obsłudze się nim zająć, bądź możesz przejąć sam nad nim kontrolę. Weź tego pacjenta pod swoje skrzydła.
Górna część panelu przedstawia dane osobowe pacjenta i przypisanie pacjenta do oddziału. Panel potrzeb po prawej stronie pokazuje poziom satysfakcji pacjenta oraz jego cechy i dziwactwa.

Z kolejnego panelu dowiesz się o możliwych diagnozach, które pasują do poznanych objawów pacjenta posortowane od najbardziej prawdopodobnych. Wybranie diagnozy pozwoli na ustawienie jej jako ostateczną.
Panel objawów przedstawia wszystkie odkryte i ukryte objawy. Po lewej możesz zobaczyć lekarza, który jest aktualnie przypisany do pacjenta.

To jest panel badań, w którym możesz zlecić badanie aby poznać ukryte objawy. Spróbuj wybrać Skórny test alergologiczny, aby poznać odpowiednią ilość ukrytych objawów, dzięki którym pozostanie tylko jedna możliwa diagnoza.
Teraz nic nas nie powstrzyma przed wyleczeniem pacjenta. Możesz najechać na ikonę wybranej diagnozy, aby zobaczyć podpowiedź sugerującą poprawne leczenie. Śmiało, wybierz kurację.
Dobra robota! Wyleczyłeś swojego pierwszego pacjenta! W zależności od wybranej kuracji, Twój pacjent wyleczy się, bądź wróci z nowymi objawami.
Teraz pomóżmy innemu pacjentowi.
Tu jest nasz kolejny pacjent. Wybierz pacjenta siedzącego w gabinecie lekarskim.
Prawdopodobnie zauważyłeś, że niektóre badania są niedostępne (wyszarzone). Potrzebują specjalnego gabinetu, bądź wyposażenia.
Jeśli najedziesz kursorem na wyszarzoną ikonę, podpowiedź poowie Ci czego brakuje. W tym przypadku brakuje nam zarówno gabinetu jak i technika zdolnego do obsługi rentgena.
W grze dostępne są podpowiedzi z dodatkowymi informacjami dla każdej ikony ze wszystkich kategorii.
Teraz pozwól nam dodać brakujące elementy kliniki.
Wszystko powinno być już w porządku i gdy otworzysz ponownie panel pacjenta będziesz mógł wybrać odpowiednie badanie.
Jeśli chcesz wiedzieć wszystko musisz sam zajmować się pacjentami, bądź monitorować stan diagnostyki. Ta sama ikona zmienia między dostępnymi trybami.??
Teraz pacjent jest pod Twoją opieką, dokładnie jak tego potrzebowaliśmy.
Panel może zostać zamknięty przez kliknięcie X w górnym prawym rogu.
To badanie może zając trochę czasu. Możesz przyspieszyć czas gry przy użyciu ikon w środkowej części głównego panelu.
Zobaczmy co się dzieje z naszym pacjentem.
Powiadomienie informuje Cię, że rentgen odkrył objawę.
Możesz zmienić sposób wyświetlania powiadomień zmieniając na 'wyskakująca' albo 'dziennik zdarzeń' w dolnym lewym rogu okna wiadomości.
Klikając OK zamkniesz powiadomienie.
Możesz ponownie otworzyć wiadomość z panelu dziennika zdarzeń w dolnym prawym rogu ekranu.
Ostanie badanie rentgenowe odkryło osatni ukryty objaw unikalny dla schorzenia pacjenta. Jeśli diagnoza nie było pewna, to potwierdzi ją ze 100% prawdopodobieństwem.
Zwykle zlecając badania (radiologiczne, statystyczne) jest najlepszą metodą na potwierdzenie diagnozy, ale zajmuje to trochę czasu. Możesz dokończyć leczenie pacjenta sam, bądź zostawić je lekarzowi.
Teraz, kiedy poznałeś podstawy przyszedł czas na ??
Niesamowite, udało Ci się! Dziękujemy za Twoją pomoc! Myślę, że jesteś potrzebny gdzie indziej, więc możesz kontynuować. Kliknij następny, aby kontynuować samouczek.
Hi boss, we also know that diagnosing was not the only thing that you did. You also were good at building hospitals.
So, welcome to this nice property we recently acquired! Let us refresh a little bit on how to build and equip your very own hospital, and what options there are.
Alright, let's build a nice little clinic first! Let's switch to building mode. You can click the button in the top left corner of the screen or just push the F6 key.
The first important step is laying down foundations. The foundations tool is selected already - cover an area big enough to house at least 3 rooms (for example 20x20 tiles).
Excellent! Now here's a quick summary of what's available to build. There are 5 main categories: foundations, constructions, doors and windows, objects and prefabs.
Each category is further divided into subcategories. Don't forget there's a tooltip for each category and item with more info!

Now that we have a place to build, we need to design our floor plan. The very basic unit of every hospital is an emergency department. Select management mode to see which rooms we'll definitely need to make the emergency department operational.
The list is divided between mandatory and optional rooms. Let's place one of each: a doctor's office, a waiting room and a restroom, these are needed for a working clinic.
Well done! With the floor plan done, let's build some walls. You can find them in the building mode under construction category.
Great! Walls are sometimes not required for the rooms to function, but some objects need to be hung on a wall.
You can also choose wall color and whether you build walls in a line or in a rectangular pattern. The different options and tools are always shown at the bottom of the building panel.
You can also build various types of floors, doors and windows. Don't forget to place doors, so your rooms and the building itself is accessible. When you are happy with your setup click next.
Let's focus on furnishing the rooms now. Simply click on the floor of any of the rooms.

The panel shows furniture and equipment that is either mandatory (orange) or recommended (yellow) for the room. Mandatory items show also alternatives. For example all equipment cabinets. But you need only one. You can rotate objects by pressing R or middle mouse button.

Right mouse button cancels current selection. Some objects need additional equipment to work. If the object in scene is tinted blue, you can hover over it (or the floor under it) and see what other equipment it needs. It will be blue in the equipment panel.
Now equip your rooms.\nWhen placing objects, arrows on the ground will show from which directions it can be accessed from.
The optional equipment usually contains decorations or objects that don't serve a particular purpose in the given room, but improve the environment.
Now all we need for a functional clinic is a doctor. We will hire one with the help from our in game tutorial - these are also available in sandbox mode.Select in-game tutorials.
Select hiring and follow the instructions to hire a doctor for emergency clinic.
When you have more departments, you can switch between them using the icons on the main panel. Select radiology department and open management mode again.
Check what rooms you need for a functional radiology department, build, equip and staff them. All of the red warning signs must be dealt with to have a functional department.
The last step on our way to a working radiology department is to hire a technologist for the X-Ray room. Follow the same steps as when you hired a doctor.
Now go ahead and finish the last objective: treat 6 patients.
Before we finish, let's have a look at the last category, and a great timesaver - prefabs. Select the prefabs category in building mode.
Now, you can see the different rooms divided by departments. Choose any of the prefabs and place it into an unoccupied area in your clinic.
You now placed a fully equipped room - it's also automatically added to the floor plan. You can of course modify it to exactly fit your needs.
Well done! It's as easy as riding a bike, isn't it?
Hi boss, with diagnosing and building out of the way, we know that you have one more talent, that also might need a little refreshment.
Let's take a closer look at hospital management.
We can start with department management. Go ahead and switch to department management mode.
This mode gives you all the information about your selected department, assigned staff and rooms. It also acts as a checklist for making the department work.
You can choose who will be the chief doctor. Be careful with this selection, it can have a big effect on the overall productivity of your employees.
"Certainty" level is an important setting for diagnostics. It determines how careful the doctors are when selecting a final diagnosis and how carefully they look for hidden symptoms.
Let's have a look at your hiring options. Click on the hiring button in your desired department's card.

There are four staff categories - doctors, nurses, technologists and janitors. You can see their experience levels, skills and their requested salary. Also the character perks can make a big difference and are often hidden.
The selection is bound to the selected department, so the employees only have matching specializations.
If you're not happy with the candidates, a hiring agency will be happy to provide you with a new list or uncover hidden perks for a fee.
To hire an employee, click on their portrait and drop them into a room. The employee will be automatically assigned to the nearest workplace. You can also assign the workplace from the employee card.
Hire a doctor for the emergency department and a technologist for the radiology department.\n\nTip: You can switch the department at the bottom left of the main panel.
Now you can check their assigned workspaces. Select management mode.

Workspaces consist of a desk, a chair and a pc as you've probably seen when building different rooms. And you can see they are now occupied (on your selected department). You can also click on an empty workspace and hire an employee that way.
Let's have a closer look at your staff. Open any of your employee's card.

Every employee has a few different statistics: their level, skills and specializations. For technologists and nurses there are three experience levels, for doctors five. Different specializations get available as the employees level up.
Skills are fixed for each type of personnel, but get improved by being used. You can learn more about individual skills in tooltips.
Specializations give the opportunity to work at certain departments or rooms and allow the employee to perform specific examinations or treatments.

Doctors can have one or two specializations. The first one allows basic work at a certain department and is available for all residents (level 2), the second one is usually related to surgery or diagnostics and available for fellows (level 4).

Employee roles give you the option to control what tasks each employee is allowed to perform. This way you can make sure that you have staff available when they are really needed, for example for surgery.

To be able to take care of hospitalized patients 24/7, the hospital needs staff assigned to both day shift and night shift. When you click the “night shift” button, notice that the border and the staff change.
Let's move to management tools for the whole hospital. First, let's have a look at departments. Open the department section of the hospital management card.
Here's a list of all of active departments. You can close them down from here.
Insurance companies are your most important partners because they control both what patients come to the hospital and how much they pay. Open the insurance section of the hospital management card.
Insurance companies have their own requirements, but when you pass these, it's up to you which insurance companies you contract and accept patients from.
Now we will take a look at ambulances. Open the ambulance section of the hospital management card.
The panel shows you the status of all your ambulances.
Next up: finance. Open the budget section of the hospital management card.
Here's a breakdown of your income and expenses for each department. You can also take a loan from a local bank if you are short on cash.
And last but not least, statistics. Open the statistics section of the hospital management card.
The statistics give you some insight into how well your hospital is doing and what the trends have been.
Now onto the fun part. Our hospital needs a functional hospitalization process at the general surgery department.

Switch to department management and select general surgery department, check what rooms you need and build them. Then hire necessary staff. All of the red warning signs must be dealt with to get hospitalization to work.\nAnd build wards with more beds, I have a feeling you will need them.
Now that we have working hospitalization, the ambulance will bring us our first patient. This should be only a minute!
Let's pause the game so you can select the patient easily and take the patient under your care.
Now let us follow the patient through our hospitalization process. This can start at the emergency department with observation or trauma hospitalization.

Patients get admitted for observation when there is no clear diagnosis and the patient could have one or more dangerous symptoms. Once the diagnosis is clear, the patient gets treated and sent home or hospitalized at a specialized department.
When the patient goes to an observation room, following examinations will be done by the on-call room staff and your doctor in the doctor's office at the clinic will take another case.
Trauma center is an essential unit for handling different types of traumas and accidents and most critical cases that your ambulances bring to the hospital arrive here.
Trauma center works the same way as the observation room. As long as the diagnosis is not clear, the patient will be examined here.
Now let's go back to our patient on their way to the trauma center. Try to find out what is wrong and reach a clear diagnosis.
With a clear diagnosis the patients get hospitalized at specialized departments. Every department has two types of inpatient rooms, regular or HDU hospitalization.
Regular ward is suitable for patients without any risk of life threatening conditions.

High dependency unit is suitable for patients in risk of collapse or life threatening conditions. They are generally equipped with life monitors to keep an eye on the vital functions of their patients.
If patients collapse, they can be sent to ICU to be connected to life support and to get continuous care. Intensive care unit is not only a hospitalization type, but also a standalone department.
So, what's the next step for our patient? Let's switch the department. Check the tooltip on the diagnosis to see which department is capable of treating it.

Let's wait for our patient to be transferred to their room. The room was chosen based on the severity of the patient's symptoms.\nTip: You can follow the patient by clicking the hidden cross over the bottom left corner of their portrait.

Hospitals work around the clock and there are a few important times in the daily schedule. Doctor's rounds happen every morning, when the doctors visit their patients and order additional examinations.
Nurses check the patients regularly, more often at HDU and ICU. They can notice dangerous symptoms and notify the doctors so the patients get examined.
Nurses also deliver meals and medicine in various forms, as prescribed.

...and when everything goes horribly wrong? Well, sometimes that happens even if you do everything right and patients will die.\nNote: death can be turned off in options, the patients will be transferred away instead.

Now it's time to treat our patient. Suppress all high hazard symptoms (some might be still hidden), notice some icons are pulsing. The patient might collapse and die if you don't prescribe the correct treatments.

Unfortunately the patient collapsed and without functional ICU must be transported away. Make sure you have enough staff available and correct roles assigned because sometimes, time is of the essence.
Unfortunately you were not able to save this patient. Make sure you have enough staff available and correct roles assigned because sometimes, time is of the essence.
We have a couple more patients coming into the hospital Suppress their high hazard symptoms (some might be still hidden) to save them from danger.
Unfortunately you were not able to save one of your patients. Make sure you have enough staff available and correct roles assigned because sometimes, time is of the essence.

Unfortunately one of your patients collapsed and without functional ICU must be transported away. Make sure you have enough staff available and correct roles assigned because sometimes, time is of the essence.
Hopefully we have covered all the important parts of hospital management and hospitalization. And now we can focus on why we requested your help. Please meet us in our next hospital.
Benchmark
Benchmark is running, this will only be a second!
Benchmark is done! Please take a screenshot before clicking next.

Hi boss, how was the refresher course? You did take it right? We'll need all of your skills if we want to challenge Misfire Medical company. We know that you used to work for Misfire Medical and you helped them to become the best.
But their greediness is what made you leave. And like you, we want to give people the best care possible. And with your help we just might be able to do it.

Hi boss, this hospital used to belong to Misfire Medical, but it was built very fast without consideration about layout and personnel, which is why it is very inefficient and losing money. The main reason they sold it.
To be able to take care of our patents we need to make this hospital efficient. See what you can improve and how many patients we can cure now.
This is a very good start, but now we need to focus on making a profit.
Good job. Making this hospital profitable is drawing more patients that needs your help. Keep it up.
It's going very well. Try to keep a steady profit now. It can be used on expansion of the hospital.
Fantastic, even more patients are coming to the hospital now. See how much you can cure.
We knew we could count on you boss. You made this hospital efficient and thanks to you more patients can be taken care of.
Unfortunately our work is far from finished, and we need your help in another hospital we just acquired. We'll meet you there.
We are in a pickle with this hospital. Our manager took a huge loan from the bank and ran with all the money.
We suspect that he was working for Misfire Medical, they just don't want us to succeed. And here, they just might.
Because if we aren't able to return the money to the bank, we will have to close this hospital. So we need you to do what you do best and help us fix this situation.
Since you are new here, the bank will let you borrow some more money, but we suspect that it is in our best interest to borrow only if absolutely necessary.

A great way to boost our money income and prestige is to successfully complete events in a row. But be careful because failing can have the opposite outcome. Events will become available once you have the whole hospital functional.
Now go and keep an eye on the bank and return money as often as possible because you can lower the interest this way.
Good job, you were able to return all the money to the bank and restored our hospital and company reputation.
Amazing job, you were able to return all the money to the bank and restored our hospital and company reputation. And you did it in record time!
Now the time has come for our greatest challenge. When you are ready, meet us in our next hospital.

Hi boss, this is the most functional hospital we have. Yet some things need to improve as always. We also need to show that our medical company can really give patients more then Misfire Medical. And we just found a way.
The state is looking to invest in the best medical company around. And with that grant and your skills we can really make a difference. There are 3 things they will be considering.
You have shown that you can run an efficient hospital that can earn money. And that is one way to be considered for the grant. To earn a large profit over a set period of time.
The other is much harder, but also more rewarding - that is keeping prestige up over a period of time. That means keeping patients and staff happy, even if that means sacrificing money sometimes.

The last one is to make hospitalization operational on all departments so we can treat every disease and injury out there. Good news is that we only need to achieve two out of these three criteria to succeed.
As before you can use events as a way to boost your prestige and income.
How you choose to approach this challenge is up to you. We wish you good luck and may the best hospital win!
Congratulations, you have done it! Our company was chosen for the grant thanks to you. Now we can start helping even more people. Keep up the good work!
Unbelievable, you have managed to meet all conditions! You really have extraordinary skills when it comes to running a hospital. Congratulations, you have won!
Building foundations
Select building mode.\n\nTip: the most useful width for rooms is 6 tiles and for corridors 4 tiles, so the recommended width of the building is 16 tiles.
Go to foundation tools.
Click on the building foundations icon and drag the mouse over the required area.\n\nTip: foundations can be removed only with the dynamite tool.
Go to construction tools.
Click on walls.\n\nTip: at the very bottom of the panel are other tools for wall placing or removing.
Select your desired material and drag to create walls or replace their materials.\n\nTip: at the bottom of the panel you can change the color of most of the patterns.
Click on doors and windows.
Place your doors and windows.\n\nTip: at the bottom of the panel you can change colors.
Building layout
Select management mode.\n\nTip: at the very bottom of the panel there are tools for changing access to your rooms.
In the clinic or hospital sections click on the required room and drag it into your building.\n\nTip: don't forget to place walls and doors for your new rooms.
Room equipment
Select building mode and right click to cancel the current tool selection.
On the floors you can see white icons of your rooms. Choose one and click\n\nTip: text in the corners of rooms will tell you what is missing.

Equipment panel shows you all mandatory (orange), recommended (yellow), and optional objects.\n\nTip: hover mouse around blue objects in the room, what's missing will get highlighted in the building panel.
Click on decorations. Here you can find decorative objects to place to your rooms.\n\nTip: decorative objects can improve the mood of characters in the room.
Click on decals. Here you can select and use wall decals.\n\nTip: at the bottom of the panel you can change color of the decals.
Hiring new staff
Select management mode.
Click on the new staff button.
Choose what profession you need.\n\nTip: to know required specialization, hover the mouse over the staff on management panel a read the tooltip.
Choose day or night shift.
Select required character and place them into the room where you want them to work.\n\nTip: after placement the character will automatically find the nearest workspace.
Ambulance
Select building mode.
Go to construction tools.
Click on ambulance and select color.
Place your ambulance on parking lot..
Open the ambulance panel. Here you can control the number of maximum patients brought by ambulances.\n\nTip: number of patients also depends on the insurance company setup.
Elevators
Select building mode.
Go to construction tools.
Click on elevator and place it in your building.\n\nTip: elevator goes through all floors.
Elevator remove works the same way through all floors.\n\nTip: if you want disable elevator for certain floor, jsut remove the door.
Prefabs
Select building mode.
Go to prefabs.
Select department, choose the required room and place it into the building.\n\nTip: you can rotate the room by using "R".
If you want to copy a room that's already built, click on copy/create prefab.
Drag and drop the area you want to copy and place it elsewhere. Or save it by selecting save prefab.
Your created prefabs can be found in category saved prefabs.\n\nTip: for deleting saved prefabs, select the prefab and than click on the delete on the tool panel.
Finance
Click on finance panel.
Here you can see finance overview for all departments and your hospital.
You can also borrow money from the bank. Click on arrows to borrow or repay.\n\nTip: loan interest is paid every day.
Overview history can be found by listing with arrows at the bottom of the panel.
Character tables
Select management mode.
In the clinic side, click on the button of patients or staff.\n\nTip: Also accessible by clicking the staff or patient numbers on the main panel.
You can filter the content by using buttons at the left upper corner.
Certainty
Select management mode.
Click on the certainty to choose level.
Low means doctors skip some examinations and choose diagnoses by percentage level. Diagnosing is much faster.
Medium means doctors are more consistent in diagnosing, probability of wrong diagnoses are lower, but it takes more time.
High, doctors are trying to find as much symptoms as possible, diagnosing is very slow, but with no chance of wrong diagnoses.
Close department
Select management mode.
Click on the close down department.\n\nTip: useful for rebuilding departments, when you need to get rid of patients but keep all the staff.
Department ready
Select management mode.
Look at the check markers, green means everything is OK.\n\nTip: place more than one stretcher to avoid problems.
Red warning signs means that you're missing something.\n\nTip: red numbers in rooms and staff shows you what exactly is missing.
Insurance companies
Click on insurance companies button.
Here you can see all insurance companies that can be contracted.\n\nTip: objectives can unlock the company or provide bonuses.
Every company also shows you how many patients they're sending per day.
You can also see a payment modifier that influences payments for cured patients.\n\nTip: high prestige increases payment modifier.
To stop sending patients by certain company, click on the disable button.
Prestige
Prestige is more like overall score of your hospital. Low prestige decreases amount of patients arriving to your hospital. High prestige makes higher profit from insurance payments.
Hover the mouse over prestige icon.\n\nTip: overall prestige of your hospital is average of departments prestige's plus event bonuses.
Select management mode.
Hover the mouse over the prestige icon on department panel.

Here you can see what influences prestige of your department. It's an average of staff and patients satisfaction plus overall treating efficiency.\n\nTip: for staff and patients the average satisfaction is the main factor.
Satisfaction
Click on patient or staff card. Satisfaction is in the right upper corner.
Satisfaction represent mood of certain character, hover the mouse over the icon and see all modifiers.\n\nTip: basic needs are shown above.
Hunger, make sure you have enough vending machines and dispensers, your staff has a fridge in their common room, and you have enough nurses to deliver food for hospitalized patients.
Bladder, you should have enough toilets in sufficient distance for your characters.
Rest, make sure that your staff is not overload by work, have a common room to rest and enough coffee.
Discomfort, treat your patients quickly to save them from annoying symptoms.
Other modifiers are created by environment, procedures and other characters perks.

There has been a road traffic accident on a major road in the region. Emergency services have been dispatched to the crash site. Your hospital should prepare for a high number of seriously wounded patients.

A major incident has been declared after a train crash! Rescue teams are on scene and emergency services are treating the wounded. Hospitals across the region must prepare for an increased number of seriously injured patients.

A serious leak has occurred at a chemical plant. Authorities are advising local residents to stay inside with their doors and windows closed, emergency services are now transporting a large number of people to nearby hospitals.

Fans of two football clubs have clashed and the brawl has resulted in a large number of injuries. Significant police presence in the area has allowed responders to treat a large number of patients at the scene but local hospitals should prepare for an increased number of trauma patients.
A bus crash has been reported! Emergency services are already on the scene and are treating the wounded. Patients with severe injuries are being transported to nearby hospitals.

Food contamination at a local restaurant has caused a serious outbreak of illness. Even though health inspectors have closed the restaurant down, local hospitals must to prepare for an increased influx of patients.
Tourists returning from vacation have fallen ill while travelling home. Patients are being transported to nearby hospitals straight from the airport.

A neighboring city's water supply has been heavily contaminated resulting in a major incident being declared in the region. Hospitals in the immediate area are unable to accept new patients and are diverting patients to other hospitals.

An outbreak of disease at a local petting zoo has caused the spread of various viral and bacterial diseases. Authorities recommend avoiding the area and are asking people who have visited the zoo to immediately report to local hospitals.

This flu season has been worse than usual, with a larger than expected number of people contracting the virus. Doctors are advising people to attend their local hospital if they believe they have the virus, expect a significant increase in patients.

Poważne powodzie pozbawiły dostaw prądu oraz zapasów dużą ilość osób. Wiele osób zostało rannych w wyniku powodzi. Szpitale powinny przygotować się na dużą ilość różnych chorób i napływ rannych pacjentów.
Ciężkie wichury przeszły nad miastem powodując rozległe uszkodzenia mienia i raniąc wiele osób. Wiele z nich jest transportowana do okolicznych szpitali.
Silne trzęsienie ziemi uderzyło w naszym regionie i spowodowało rozległe uszkodzenia mienia oraz powodując dużą ilość rannych. Lokalne szpitale muszą być przygotowane na ofiary zdarzenia.

Silna fala upałów przechodzi przez nasze miasto. Duża ilość osób cierpi na odwodnienie i problemy z układem oddechowym. Lokalne szpitale powinny być gotowe na więcej przypadków z wymienionymi wyżej schorzeniami.
Załamanie na giełdzie! Korespodenci donoszą niebywale wysoki odsetek prób samobójczych skutkujące zaburzeniami pracy mózgu i serca.
Workload
Select management mode.

In certain rooms you can see workload value, representing work of last 24h. 0% means that staff had nothing to do, 100% means that staff is overloaded by work.\n\nTip: an ideal number is different for each type of room.
Labs have no workload value, but number of samples waiting for examination.
Waiting rooms also has no workload value, but number of waiting patients.
Warning: don't build separated buildings, all floors must be connected together, otherwise the rooms won't work.

Hi Boss, and welcome to our challenge scenario. Your task is simple. Cure {1}% of your patients every day for 10 days. With 5 clinic patients and 1 ambulance patient increase every day. Fail one day and the challenge is over. Your success will be checked at midnight. Happy curing.
Congratulations you have now become a {1}.
Unfortunately you were not able to treat the sufficient amount of patients. You can always try again.
You can boost income and patient intake by completing objectives for our friendly insurance company. It should make this easier.

Sprawdź jakich pomieszczeń brakuje na Oddziale Chirurgii Ogólnej i wybuduj je. Pamiętaj, że pomieszczenia z czerwonymi numerami obok, są wymagane. Podpowiedzi dla pomieszczeń na liście dostarczą dodatkową porcję informacji.

Mamy już porządek z pomieszczeniami, czas atrudnić brakującego członka załogi. Wygląda, że brakuje nam chirurga. Jak najedziesz na ??profesje, podpowiedzi podpowiedzą Ci jaka umiejętność jest wymagana. Śmiało, zatrudnij chirurga na Oddział Chirurgii Ogólnej.\nWszystkie czerwone oznaczenia musisz wziąć pod uwagę, aby hospitalizacja zaczęła działać.
Wejdź do trybu zarządzania oddziałem i wybierz Oddział Chirurgii Ogólnej.

Wylecz naszego pacjenta. ??Stłum wszystkie objawy zagrażające życiu (niektóre wciąż mogą być ukryte), zwracając uwagę na niektóre pulsujące ikony. Pacjent może dostać zapaści i umrzeć jeśli nie zlecisz odpowiedniego leczenia.

Niestety pacjent dostał zapaści i bez działającego Oddziału Intensywnej musi zostać przetransportowany z Twojego szpitala (albo sam go odesłałeś). Upewnij się, że masz odpowiednią ilość personelu z przypisanymi poprawnymi rolami, ponieważ czasami to jest najważniejsze. Spróbuj jeszcze raz od początku.

Niestety nie byłeś w stanie uratować pacjenta. Upewnij się, że masz odpowiednią ilość personelu z przypisanymi poprawnymi rolami, ponieważ czasami to jest najważniejsze. Spróbuj jeszcze raz od początku.
